creditline: Gift of funds from B. Franklin Rassieur, Jr., and other donors
description: view of a wagon on a ferry with four figures and horses, in front of a bridge with two arches; two figures wearing top hats in shadows in foreground; trees in foreground and behind wall at right; tower behind bridge, left of center
inscription:

on back, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
portfolio: From From a series of landscapes
provenance: (Pia Gallo, New York); sold to MIA, 2011.
title: Ferry in Front of a Stone Bridge
